title: Shorty Rogers - You Shorty, Me Tarzan! (1956-58)
description:
SHORTY ROGERS & THE GIANTS - YOU SHORTY, ME TARZAN!

TARZAN, THE APE MAN (soundtrack)

1. The Elephant Wail [3:25]
2. Los Barbaros [1:40]
3. Paradise Found [3:05]
4. Trapped [1:55]
5. Los Primitivos [2:14]
6. Oomgawa [3:25]
7. Tarzanic Suite [17:34]

Shorty Rogers (flugelhorn), Al Porcino, Buddy Childers, Don Fagerquist, Ollie Mitchell (trumpets), Harry Betts, Frank Rosolino, Bob Eneveldsen, Marshall Cram (trombones), Bud Shank, Bill Perkins, Bob Cooper, Bill Holman, Chuck Gentry, Bill Hood (saxes), Pete Jolly (piano), Joe Mondragon, Buddy Clark (bass), Frank Capp, Modesto Duran, Carlos Rosario, Chico Guerrero, Chach Gonzales (drums, percussion); Hollywood, 1959

BIG BAND GIANTS
8. Mountain Greenery [3:19]
9. Martian Lullaby [4:57]
10. Blusies [4:09]
11. Big Band Blues [2:17]
12. I Want To Be Happy [1:15]

Shorty Rogers (flugelhorn0, Bob Enevoldsen (valve trombone0, Frank Rosolino (trombone), plus unidentified brass players, Herb Geller (alto sax), Bill Holman (tenor sax), Pepper Adams (baritone sax), Jimmy Rowles (piano), unknown bass and drums, Pete Rugolo (arranger), June Christy (vocal track 12); KABC-Tv-Show "The Stars Of Jazz", Los Angeles, June 2, 1958

THE THREE LITTLE BOPS
13. The Three Little Bops [6:26]

Stan Freberg (vocal), Shorty Rogers (trumpet), Jimmy Giuffre (baritone sax), Barney Kessel (guitar), Pete Jolly (piano), Red Callendar (bass), Shelly Manne or Stan Levey (drums); Hollywood, Fall 1956

2010 Giant Steps Records
